title: na thappulanu
sahitya:
nA tappulanu mannincaka yuNDuTe nyAyamu gAdurA shrI rAmA

anupallavi

 pAdakuDagu nannu khyAdiga brOcitE nI tAtasommEmi bOdurA rAma

caraNam 1

 Apannulaku vAru apacAra parulaitE Adarincu vArevarurA 
pApamulanuyeDa bApa jEsi nA bhayamu dIrcci nanu pAlincarA taNDri
 
caraNam 2

 talli taNDrulavale tagu buddhi delupucu daya jUDanu vEga rArA 
ullamuna dalaciyup-pongucunnAnu uraga shayana brOva tAmasamElarA
 
caraNam 3

 tAmarAkupai niLLavalenu nIvu tappincakayuNTE viTavanurA 
rAmacandrapura varulaku vEnkaTaramaNa bhAgavatula brOcuTa nijamaitE
